meanings.definition: A country, group, or person that has power and influence over others
meanings.sent1: The hegemon of the playground was the student who everyone looked up to.
meanings.sent2: The United States was considered the hegemon of the Western world after World War II.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought he was the hegemon of the house, always demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, the designer was the undisputed hegemon, setting trends for all to follow.
meanings.sent5: The lion, as the hegemon of the jungle, ruled over all other animals with authority.

meanings.definition: The dominant leader or ruler in a particular field or region
meanings.sent1: As the hegemon of the tech industry, the company controlled the market share.
meanings.sent2: She established herself as the hegemon of the local art scene with her unique style.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel believed he was the hegemon of the park, hoarding all the acorns for himself.
meanings.sent4: The CEO, acting as the hegemon of the corporation, made all the major decisions.
meanings.sent5: The champion boxer was the hegemon of the ring, undefeated in all his matches.
